high_descs: Turn around and walk to the CD next to the lamp on the dresser.
Pick up the CD on the dresser.
Walk to the left side of the dresser and look at the lamp.
Turn on the lamp on the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Turn on the lamp on the dresser while carrying a CD.

high_descs: Turn and move to stand in front of the dresser where the lamp is.
Pick up the CD from the corner of the dresser.
Move around to the end of the dresser, so the cell phone is now positioned in front of the lamp.
Turn on the lamp while still holding the CD.
anns.task_desc: Turn on a lamp while carrying a CD.

high_descs: Turn around, go forward, then turn left to face the dresser.
Pick up the CD on the dresser, to the left of the clock.
Turn left, move forward, turn right, step forward, then turn right to face the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine a CD in the light.
